quote: She laughed. ''You seem pretty normal.''''You've never seen Ben snort Sprite up his nose and then spit it out of his mouth,'' I said.''I look like a demented carbonated fountain,'' he deadpanned.
quote_letters: SHE LAUGHED YOU SEEM PRETTY NORMALYOUVE NEVER SEEN BEN SNORT SPRITE UP HIS NOSE AND THEN SPIT IT OUT OF HIS MOUTH I SAIDI LOOK LIKE A DEMENTED CARBONATED FOUNTAIN HE DEADPANNED
